message:
CONVERSATION

Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.
Him : pretty fair age. nah my first movie crush came way way before that. it was like when i was 5 or 6 maybe.
 
CONVERSATION
Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.
Him : oh, so you're saying I was already a smooth talker chasing crushes at 5? 😏

CONVERSATION
Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.
Him : wow, I'm so impressed. So, did you have a secret T-con fan club where you discussed plot twists at recess?

CONVERSATION
Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.
Him : cool cool, so basically you were a genius prodigy who understood all the deep philosophical themes in T-con at such a young age, right? 🧐

CONVERSATION
Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.
Him : 9 years old and already binging movies for intellectuals? I guess we were meant to find each other, my cultured counterpart. 😎
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this prompt could be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : yes. i watched tcon when i was 9.  
    Him : Him : pretty fair age. nah my first movie crush came way way before that. it was like when i was 5 or 6 maybe.
